Sense and Respond

DRAFT (Coming Soon!)

Process Flow

  • Click on a task in the flow for details
  • BLUE colored shapes are “Sense and Respond” phase tasks relevant to Design
  • Hover OVER the task to see who OWNS the task
  • Tasks marked with a “GxP Only” label can be skipped for non-regulated offerings
  • Tasks marked with a “CS Only” label can be skipped for offerings that are NOT common services
